verbs.description: [ARGM-ADV: Unlike the opposition Peoples Democratic Party , PDP] , [ARG0: Aisha Buhari , the wife of the Nigerian President] [V: believes] [ARG1: that her husband has represented the country very well in his ongoing trip to the United States during which he met with President Donald Trump on Monday] .

Unlike the opposition Peoples Democratic Party , PDP , Aisha Buhari , the wife of the Nigerian President believes that her husband [V: has] represented the country very well in his ongoing trip to the United States during which he met with President Donald Trump on Monday .

Unlike the opposition Peoples Democratic Party , PDP , Aisha Buhari , the wife of the Nigerian President believes that her husband has represented the country very well in [ARGM-LOC: his ongoing trip to the United States] [R-ARGM-TMP: during which] [ARG0: he] [V: met] [ARG1: with President Donald Trump] [ARGM-TMP: on Monday] .
